short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Go live using OneStream Live Studio: Host your own session or join as a guest!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The OneStream Live Chrome Extension is designed to enable the streamers to host or join Live Studio sessions with a single click, and broadcast to over 45 platforms and the web directly from their Chrome browser. This extension provides a cohesive environment to control and execute Live Studio streams with a straightforward interface, reducing the need for complex setup or multiple tools. 

KEY FEATURES

- Simplified multistreaming of Live Studio sessions to a wide range of platforms via browser.
- Intuitive interface that minimizes setup time for Live Studio sessions.
- Centralized control over Studio live streams to maintain consistency and quality for viewers.

ABOUT ONESTREAM LIVE

OneStream Live is a cloud-based live streaming solution that allows users to multistream real-time and recorded videos on 45+ social media platforms, custom RTMP destinations, and the web simultaneously.
